extension.summary: InternetPVR is a Media tracking suit which combines the programs: SickBeard, CouchPotato V2 and Headphones in one Addon
extension.description:
- Sickbeard: Tracks your TVShows and automatically downloads the next one when it becomes available. - Couchpotato: Automatically searches for and downloads your Movie torrents according to your requests. - Headphones: Automatically searches for and downloads Music.
InternetPVR is a fork of lsellens' SickPotatoHead.
